summary: A man has the knack for finding stolen items. Then returns them to the insurance company. Finds some fake jewels and turns them in. Antics ensue.
cast: Donald Woods|Patricia Ellis|Grace Bradley|Edward Brophy|William Demarest|Craig Reynolds|Andrew Tombes|Bert Roach|Leon Weaver|Edwin Maxwell|Granville Bates|Jean Joyce|Georgia Simmons|Lynton Brent|Ralph Dunn|Fred Santley
keywords: rivalry|bound and gagged|tied to a chair|chambermaid|blown cover
title: Romance on the Run
